articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Sungri Motor Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Sungri Motor Complex
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Sungri Motor Complex which successfully carried out the task for producing new style trucks given by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. 
					 He went round the Sungrisan Revolutionary Museum, the room dedicated to the history of the complex and the room preserving revolutionary historic mementoes.
					
					 He saw with deep emotion the photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il watching Sungri-58 truck produced by the Tokchon Automobile Plant, predecessor of the Sungri Motor Complex, on May 16, 1965. He said it was a photo of great significance and that the complex could make a great contribution to developing economy and strengthening defence capability of the country by producing a lot of various trucks under the wise and careful leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He watched new style five-ton trucks produced by the complex.
					
					 Watching with a bright smile on his face trucks standing in rows full in the broad park, he said they were trucks of Juche Korea manufactured by our workers with their own efforts and he was encouraged and satisfied to see the trucks, extending militant greetings to the workers of the complex.
					
					 He personally drove a truck to learn in detail about its performance and technical specifications.
					
					 He noted that the handsome and attractive five ton-trucks of our style were precious wealth produced in the Mallima era.
					
					 He added that the newly produced five-ton trucks proved that the hostile forces' desperate efforts to block the advance of the DPRK make the indomitable spirit of the Korean workers stronger and make them produce a great miracle startling the world.
					
					 After going round the assembling shop, precision processing shop, engine shop and other places, he gave the production assignment for next year and set forth important tasks facing the complex.
					
					 It is very important for the country to produce trucks by itself in order to develop economy and strengthen national power, he stated, calling for remodeling and updating the complex as required by the new century so that it can massively produce modern trucks.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials and workers of the complex would successfully carry out the task advanced by the Party for remodeling and updating the complex and thus make a positive contribution to fully satisfying the daily-increasing need for transportation. 
					
					 He had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were O Su Yong and Pak Thae Song, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Sunday.
					 The message says:
					
					 I express thanks to you and the friendly leadership and people of your country for having extended kind congratulations on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the glorious corrective movement in the Syrian Arab Republic.
					
					 I most heartily wish you good health and happiness and the people of your country greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I reiterate our will to consolidate the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in line with the interests and wellbeing of their friendly peoples.

articles.title: Chairman of Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group Here
articles.content:
Chairman of Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group Here
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Baasankhuu Oktyabri, chairman of Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliament Group, and his party arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: European Politicians Here
articles.content:
European Politicians Here
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe led by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Measuring Instruments Installed in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Measuring Instruments Installed in Samjiyon County
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Automatic instruments for measuring sulfurous acid gas and floating dust have been installed in Samjiyon County, the DPRK, as part of the efforts to turn the county into an iconic and model one of the country.
					 Those instruments were manufactured by scientists of the Environmental Science and Technology Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 They need no accessory equipment and no chemical reagents in operation.
					
					 They are simple in structure, convenient in use and very high in accuracy.
					
					 Their installation would be conducive to putting the ecological and environmental management on a higher scientific basis in the county.

articles.title: Reagents for Botanical Tissue Culture Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Reagents for Botanical Tissue Culture Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Purine compound and auxin, reagents for botanical tissue culture, are expected to be widely introduced into the forest management of the DPRK.
					 Forestry management stations in Anju City, Phyongwon County and other parts of South Phyongan Province are gaining much economic benefit from the introduction of those reagents which help strengthening the functions of growth substances.
					
					 The reagents were developed by a research group of Sukchon University of Agriculture with locally available raw materials.
					
					 They promote the root growth of saplings, germination rate of seeds and growth rate of saplings and thus ensure the rooting rate at over 96 percent.
					
					 According to Yun Hyok Chol, vice-rector of the university, the reagents make it possible to multiply plants and crops in an industrial way.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime's Trumpeting about "Balanced Diplomacy"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime's Trumpeting about "Balanced Diplomacy"
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is making eyes at neighboring countries to curry favor with them while zealously advocating "balanced diplomacy" only to provoke sickening feelings.
					 This is a pipe dream that can never come true for the colonial stooges serving the U.S.
					
					 The "balanced diplomacy" was first advocated by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					
					 By the "balanced diplomacy" it is meant to pursue diplomacy evenly by keeping balance in relations with other countries, neighboring big powers in particular.
					
					 This faced a total failure as Park Geun Hye pursued the deployment of THAAD which the neighboring countries stand strongly against in their national interests, at the end of offering her everything to her guardian-lover like U.S. As a result, "diplomacy of imbalance" caused diplomatic catastrophe and disaster.
					
					 It was not long ago that south Korea was beaten here and there just like a village drum.
					
					 But, being oblivious of this, the south Korean authorities trumpet about the failed policy of the preceding "government".
					
					 Recently the puppet forces have claimed that they "would put the bilateral exchange and cooperation on a normal track" and a "prelude to balanced diplomacy has opened", asserting that their chief executive's planned visit to neighboring countries due next month would offer an important occasion for restoring the relations that had been aggravated due to THAAD issue.
					
					 It is illogical for the puppet forces to talk about "balanced diplomacy" as they completely rely on the U.S. and they only move at its beck and call.
					
					 The south Korean authorities is nicknamed as "poodle" of Trump as it yields to the U.S. and creeps around the U.S. legs. How can they trumpet about "balanced diplomacy" in such a situation.
					
					 The "balanced diplomacy" is sheer sophism that had never existed and can never exist for the stooges like the puppet forces subservient to the U.S., and it is a sleight of hand to get "security" from the U.S. and economic interests from neighboring countries.
					
					 The only way out for the colonial stooges is to kowtow to the U.S., without dignity.
					
					 The south Korean diplomacy is fated to face any diplomatic disaster at the end of following the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not go reckless, clearly understanding their poor plight of being subservient to the U.S.

articles.title: Trump Should Pay Dearly for Hideous Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Trump Should Pay Dearly for Hideous Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The hideous crimes committed by the lunatic president of the U.S. are a blatant challenge to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, a wanton violation of its sovereignty and a vicious insult to the genuine life of the Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Those who trample down and make a mockery of the DPRK's dignity can never go scot-free.
					
					 Trump is a heinous criminal who should be sternly punished at the DPRK's court and at the court of justice and human conscience.
					
					 We can never overlook the fact that Trump malignantly slandered and insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its socialist system as well as the dignified life of the Korean people during his recent junket to south Korea. His behavior totally depriving the DPRK of its sovereignty and rights to existence and development constitutes the height of politically-motivated provocation and unprecedented hideous crime. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK regard the dignity of their supreme leadership dearer than their own lives, and they show no mercy to anyone attempting to hurt it in the least.
					
					 Those who seek to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership and its social system and people can never evade a merciless punishment no matter whoever they are and wherever they may be.
					
					 The confrontational maniacs challenging the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its socialist system centered on the popular masses should clearly know that they will have to pay a very high price for their unpardonable crimes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Regime's Moves for Purchase of U.S. Weapons and Bolstering Missile Force
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Regime's Moves for Purchase of U.S. Weapons and Bolstering Missile Force
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- At recent talks with Trump in Seoul, the south Korean chief executive promised to purchase U.S. military hardware running at a huge amount for the three years to come. In return for this, the U.S. promised to lift the measure for restricting the weights of ballistic missile warheads of the puppet forces.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says the puppet forces' agreement to purchase U.S. weapons and moves for bolstering ballistic missile weaponry is a dangerous military confrontational act aimed to further strain the situation on the Korean peninsula and endanger the regional peace and stability.
					
					 The puppet forces who had the measure for restricting the ballistic missile warhead weights lifted in return for offering huge amount of money collected from the people as taxes to their master under the pretext of buying American military hardware are now going upbeat as if they have done something big, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is a senseless act of fools unaware of where they stand and ignorant of the tremendous might of the DPRK's nuclear force.
					
					 We will never tolerate the puppet warmongers' reckless acts of provocation as they threaten the destiny of the nation while talking about the purchase of U.S. weapons and development of military hardware. It is as foolish as precipitating self-destruction for the puppet forces to dare challenge, with the backing of the U.S., the nuclear power of Juche, the world-level military power.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should not run amuck, deeply pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless military provocations.

articles.title: Trump's Asian Trip Is Trade Visit of Moneygrubber: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Trump's Asian Trip Is Trade Visit of Moneygrubber: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Throughout the period of his visits to Japan and south Korea, Trump said that the most effective way to cope with "threat" from the DPRK is to purchase more weapons of the U.S.  He even said the way for settling the trade deficits with allies lies in massive purchase of American weapons, not content with citing "threat" from the DPRK as a pretext.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says that Trump has disclosed his inborn nature as a moneygrubber.
					
					 During his trips to Japan and south Korea, he loudly vociferated about "threat from north Korea" but in fact the aim is to meet his greed for money, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is a trite method of the U.S. to intervene in situation of various regions of the world, deliberately strain the tension there and to make money by availing itself of the opportunities. This has become all the more pronounced under the Trump administration.
					
					 Trump is letting out such lunatic outbursts as "total destruction of north", "annihilation", "calm before storm", thereby maximizing the stand-off with the DPRK. An aim lurking behind this is to make munitions monopolies rake up profits and make a bundle of money in return.
					
					 Trump is, indeed, trader and moneygrubber earning money in return for pushing the destiny of the U.S. mainland and the Americans into danger.
					
					 The real threat to the world comes from lunatics, war merchants and money-makers like Trump.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Dissolution of "Liberal Korea Party"
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Dissolution of "Liberal Korea Party"
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- There reportedly took place a mammoth public candlelight rally and meeting in Seoul on Nov. 18 in demand of dissolution of the "Liberal Korea Party" and eradication of the evils left by the former conservative regimes.
					 Citizens gathered in front of the LKP building in Youido where they demanded the immediate dissolution of the party with candlelight in their hands.
					
					 Speakers there accused a lawmaker from the party of branding the campaigners for combating the evils left by the former conservative regimes as "Juche idea followers" and "left-wing followers of the north."
					
					 The participants expressed their will to get the party, the cesspool of evils, dissolved without fail.
					
					 There was an all-people meeting in front of the People's Bank calling for eradication of evils, reforms of society and peace against war.
					
					 More than 12 000 people of various circles from across south Korea took part in the meeting.
					
					 Speakers there said the public ousted Park Geun Hye from power and sent her to jail with their concerted efforts but those who escaped punishment made the "Liberal Korea Party" and are quenching the desire of the candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 Civic and social organizations including the April 16 Solidarity headed for the "National Assembly" building from the Kwanghwamun Plaza.
					
					 They criticized the coteries of the LKP for deceiving the people.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts Phohang of South Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts Phohang of South Korea
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.6 on a Richter scale hit the area 11 km north of Phohang City of North Kyongsang Province of south Korea at dawn of Monday, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Earlier, there was a quake of 3.5 on a Richter scale in the area 9 km north of the city on Nov. 19.
					
					 The quakes are reportedly estimated as aftershocks of a great quake in the city on Nov. 15.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A joint committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il comprised of figures of the political parties and organizations under the Communist Party of Soviet Union was formed on Nov. 13 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					 The remembrance committee, chaired by Mozgovoy, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Soviet Union and chairman of the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party", is made up of personages of such political parties and organizations as the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan, Communist Workers Party of Russia, Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Sofia on Nov. 10.
					 Mincho Minchev, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party and chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including seminar and film show on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Russia
Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House in Russia on Nov. 15 brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modelling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".
					 The work, published on Nov. 17, Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the Korean women's movement is a Juche-based movement which was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and has covered a glorious course of development under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways facing the women's union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri que cumplio con exito la tarea de produccion de camiones de carga de nuevo tipo, dada por el Partido, haciendo gala del espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio primero el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Sungrisan, la sala de presentacion del historial y la otra de conservacion de objetos historicos revolucionarios.
					
					El contemplo con profunda emocion una foto del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, viendo el 16 de mayo de 1965 el camion de carga de tipo "Sungri-58" producido en la fabrica automovilistica de Tokchon, predecesora del Complejo, y dijo que bajo la direccion sabia y minuciosa de los lideres antecesores, el Complejo produjo en el pasado muchos camiones de varios tipos, de manera que hizo gran aporte al desarrollo economico y el fortalecimiento de la fuerza de defensa nacional del pais.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente presencio nuevos camiones de carga de 5 toneladas, hechos en el Complejo.
					
					Admirando con amplia sonrisa los camiones enfilados en aparcamiento, mostro gran satisfaccion y dio el saludo combativo a los obreros del Complejo que fabricaron con las propias fuerzas los automoviles de Corea del Juche.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente condujo un camion para estudiar detalladamente el funcionamiento y las caracteristicas tecnicas del vehiculo.
					
					Encomio reiteradamente los camiones como riquezas preciosas nacidas en la epoca de Mallima y dijo con enfasis que nuevos productos comprueban que cuanto mas se desesperen las fuerzas hostiles para impedir nuestro avance, tanto mas se hace fuerte la indoblegable fuerza espiritual de los obreros coreanos y se logran grandes milagros asombrosos.
					
					Luego de recorrer los talleres de montaje, elaboracion con precision y motor y otros lugares, indico la tarea de produccion de camiones a cumplirse hasta el ano siguiente por el Complejo y las otras programaticas que se presentan ante el Complejo.
					
					Para desarrollar la economia del pais y consolidar el poderio del Estado es muy importante la fabricacion de automoviles con las propias fuerzas, acoto y subrayo la necesidad de modernizar el Complejo conforme a la exigencia de nuevo siglo para que la unidad produzca en abundancia los modernos camiones de carga.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los obreros del Complejo cumpliran sin falta las tareas de remodelacion y modernizacion presentadas por el partido, satisfaciendo asi suficientemente la creciente demanda de transporte, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong y Pak Thae Song, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le dirigiera el dia 19 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a Vd. y a la direccion y el pueblo de su pais amistoso por haberme enviado amables felicitaciones con motivo del 47o aniversario del glorioso Movimiento de Rectificacion en la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					
					Formulo votos mas sinceros por la salud y felicidad de Vd. y por el mayor progreso y prosperidad del pueblo de su pais.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para afirmar nuestra voluntad de consolidar los lazos de amistad y cooperacion, existentes entre ambos paises, conforme a los intereses y bienestar de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises amistosos.

articles.title: Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion de politicos de los partidos europeos
articles.content:
Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion de politicos de los partidos europeos
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 21 a esta capital la delegacion de los politicos de varios partidos europeos, encabezada por el ejecutor en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion, Jonathan Powell.

articles.title: Trump pagara muy caro su tremendo crimen, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Trump pagara muy caro su tremendo crimen, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El tremendo acto criminal del demencial presidente norteamericano constituye el desafio frontal a la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la violacion flagrante de la soberania de ella y el insulto brutal a la vida verdadera del pueblo coreano.
					No sera perdonado nunca el que haya manchado y ultrajado la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Trump es el criminal de peor calana que merece ser llevado al tribunal de la RPDC y condenado por la justicia y conciencia de la humanidad.
					
					Su delito mas grave es haber ofendido la maxima dignidad y regimen socialista de nuestro pais y calumniado la vida valiosa de nuestro pueblo.
					
					En particular, hay que pasar cuentas de la provocacion politica de Trump quien pretende acabar con nuestra soberania y derechos a la existencia y al desarrollo.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo aprecian la maxima dignidad mas que su vida y liquidan implacablemente a los que intenten mancharla.
					
					Los maniacos de confrontacion que desafian a nuestra maxima dignidad y regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares deben conocer bien que pagaran sin falta muy caro sus imperdonables crimenes.
